original_text: During Saul’s reign they waged war against the Hagrites, who were defeated at their hands; they occupied the dwellings of the Hagrites throughout the entire region east of Gilead.
korean_text: 사울 왕 때에 그들이 하갈 사람과 더불어 싸워 손으로 쳐죽이고 길르앗 동쪽 온 땅에서 장막에 거주하였더라

sentences.original_text: During Saul's reign they waged war against the Hagrites
sentences.korean_translation: 사울의 통치 기간 동안 그들은 하그릿 사람들과 전쟁을 벌였으며

sentences.original_text: who were defeated at their hands
they occupied the dwellings of the Hagrites
throughout the entire region east of Gilead
